name: In re OBJECTION TO the NOMINATION PETITION OF Joseph MANCUSO. Appeal of Dorothy C. KELLY
name_abbreviation: In re Objection to Nomination Petition of Mancuso

parties: In re OBJECTION TO the NOMINATION PETITION OF Joseph MANCUSO. Appeal of Dorothy C. KELLY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Court being evenly divided, the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County is affirmed.
CAPPY and CASTILLE, JJ., and MONTEMURO, Senior Justice, who is sitting by designation, dissent and would reverse the Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gary N. Altman, for Dorothy C. Kelly.
Richard E. Bower, for Joseph Mancuso.
casebody.head_matter:
657 A.2d 937
In re OBJECTION TO the NOMINATION PETITION OF Joseph MANCUSO. Appeal of Dorothy C. KELLY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 24, 1995.
Decided April 26, 1995.
Gary N. Altman, for Dorothy C. Kelly.
Richard E. Bower, for Joseph Mancuso.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
